title: Tools built for real ateliers
subtitle: From parameterized style templates and fabric catalogs to QC checklists and milestone payouts— Qlozet streamlines your workflow so you can focus on the craft.

items.title: Style Templates
items.description: Parameterize necklines, sleeves, lengths, and embellishments with price impacts.

items.title: Fabric & Accessories
items.description: List fabric SKUs with yardage guidance; attach accessories or upsells per style.

items.title: Fit Verification
items.description: Auto flags for suspicious measurements and optional customer photo overlays.

items.title: Proof & QC
items.description: Capture cut tickets, mockups, and pre-ship photos against a checklist.

items.title: Messaging & Briefs
items.description: Chat with customers, confirm specs, and lock change requests by milestone.

items.title: Analytics
items.description: Lead time, on-time rate, revisions, and earnings—broken down by style and region.
